name: sync::mpmc::array::Channel::<T>::try_send

sync::mpmc::array::Channel::<T>::start_s.doc: Attempts to reserve a slot for sending a message.

sync::mpmc::array::Channel::<T>::write.doc: Writes a message into the channel.

sync::mpsc::TrySendError::Disconnected.doc:
This [`sync_channel`]'s receiving half has disconnected, so the data could not be
 sent. The data is returned back to the callee in this case.

doc: Attempts to send a message into the channel.
